subject: I am Lt Mrs. Marquez Jane Peir
body:
I am Lt Mrs. Marquez Jane Peire, a U.S soldier currently  carrying out my duty in Iran. I have a proposal for you. I and some of my colleagues recovered some huge amounts of money here the last two weeks during an operation. We just shared the money some days ago and I want to move mine to a safe place. Why am I contacting you through this mail because this is the only means of communication I have here. 
I came across your email when I was searching for a random person online who I can trust with this proposal.
 I am willing to offer you40% of the total money which is $7.8 million USD if you are willing to do the deal with me and I want you to know that this is very legit.
Here is my personal email address: (
itmanepeire399@gmail.com
) you can reply to me here if you are willing to do this deal with me and I will advise you ahead on how I will send the funds out to you.
I will wait for your response.
Thank You Lt Mrs. Marquez Jane Peire,

subject: Re: I am Lt Mrs. Marquez Jane Peir
body:
Hello Lt Mrs. Marquez Jane Peire,

Thank you for reaching out to me with your proposal. I must say, it sounds quite intriguing. I appreciate that you trust me enough to share this opportunity.

Could you please provide me with more details about the operation and how exactly the money was recovered? I want to make sure I fully understand the situation before moving forward.

Additionally, what would be my role in this deal? How can I assist you in moving the funds to a safe place?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Lorraine
